content.header: What are the details of your consignment?
content.paragraph: You can add up to 3 product categories to this export health certificate. Use a new record for each category.

fields.label: Identification or shipping mark
fields.hint: Enter the marks on the container
fields.name: id_marking

fields.label: Net weight
fields.hint: Provide the number and the units of measurement. For example, 105 kg
fields.name: weight_of_packages

pages.title: For animals slaughtered and processed in the United Kingdom

content.header: For animals slaughtered and processed in the United Kingdom
content.paragraph: If the animals were slaughtered and processed outside the United Kingdom, leave this blank.

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of the slaughterhouse
fields.name: sh_name_addres

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of the cutting plant
fields.name: cp_name_address

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of the processing/ producing plant
fields.name: pp_name_address

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of the final processing or producing establishment
fields.name: pp_number

fields.label: Production dates
fields.hint: Provide in format: DD/MM/YYYY to DD/MM/YYYY
fields.name: pp_dates

pages.title: For animals slaughtered and processed outside the United Kingdom

content.header: For animals slaughtered and processed outside the United Kingdom
content.paragraph: If the animals were slaughtered and processed in the United Kingdom, leave this blank.

fields.label: Foreign establishment approval numbers
fields.hint: Enter the slaughterhouse number followed by other establishment approval numbers
fields.name: foreign_establishment
fields.default: ABC limited, France SA, Paris 039432. Registration number - FR3945-2342

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of the cold store of dispatch
fields.name: processing_export_product

content.paragraph: Provide details of the person who will send the consignment, or their representative.

pages.title: How will the consignment be transported?

content.header: How will the consignment be transported?

fields.label: Means of transport
fields.hint: Enter the means of transport and the seal and container numbers
fields.name: transport_means

pages.title: What is the destination of this consignment?

content.header: What is the destination of this consignment?

fields.label: Place of unloading within the destination country
fields.name: consignee_destination
fields.default: ABC limited Australia, 637 Rowley Street, Melbourne, CIC2002

content.paragraph: Provide details of the person the consignment will be shipped to, or their representative.

fields.label: Name and address of consignee
fields.name: consignee_address
fields.default: ABC limited Australia, 637 Rowley Street, Melbourne, CIC2002
